description:
Timeless. This wee hooded fleece takes the chill off playtime and layers well under a rain shell or winter jacket. It has classic style and even a bit of a retro nod, but the brushed polyester is entirely warmth-without-weight modern.

  • Soft recycled polyester mid-weight fleece with a brushed finish
  • Front zipper has a chin guard
  • Elastic edge binding on hood, cuffs and hem seals out drafts
  • Fold-over mitts protect tiny fingers from the elements
  • Curved back hem provides coverage
  • Internal name label ensures it won't get misplaced at daycare
name: MEC Fireside Hooded Jacket - Infants
